content: Also discussed in #issues, but what do people think about a user option that disables (enables?) "Esc goes to Home view"? This would enable people that don't use Home to freely hit Esc to clear whatever it is they want to clear.

Actually another proposal from Steve (that I like better) is to just have an option for what the hotkey should be. E.g. the option could be "Keyboard shortcut for All messages", with two options, A (default) and Esc. (or H instead of A, or whatever.)

(I know A is already claimed by switching streams, but I think the hotkey for that should probably be alt+shift+down or ctrl+shift+down or similar).
Yeah, I see no reason to maintain the current A/D as those keys.
A/D are rarely used and they can't even get to all streams as of right now
